message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product I am offering is not just any item; it holds immense value and significance, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. Given its unique qualities and the benefits it promises, I believe its true worth exceeds $10000. Considering its exceptional nature, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $12000. This is a chance to acquire something truly remarkable at a price that represents a strategic investment in your future. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
